mapper.select: SELECT s.feed_no ,f.file_no ,f.file_name FROM sns s RIGHT OUTER JOIN files f ON s.feed_no = f.file_code_no WHERE f.file_code_no = #{feedNo} GROUP BY s.feed_no ,f.file_no ,f.file_name
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM files WHERE file_code_no = #{feedNo} and file_code='J1'
mapper.select: SELECT c.chall_no , c.confirm_no, ( select f.file_name from files f where f.file_code_no = c.confirm_no -- and rownum < 2 ) as file_name -- FROM chall_confirm c WHERE c.chall_no = #{challNo} ORDER BY c.confirm_no DESC
